accueil.multi_machine_print_desc: Record your print on all available machines and optimize your prints!

admin_aide.title: Machine Help Management
admin_aide.no_aides: No help configured at the moment.
admin_aide.help_instructions: Use the editor to format text and add images. The help will be displayed on the consumable change page.
admin_aide.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the help for

tirage_multimachines.title: Multi-Machine Printing
tirage_multimachines.subtitle: Record your print job on all available machines
tirage_multimachines.choose_tambour: Choose the drum used for this print job
tirage_multimachines.adjust_fill_rate: Adjust the color fill rate (0% = very light, 100% = very dark)

stats.title: Statistics
stats.intro_text: Since the beginning of the dupli adventure in 2011, we have printed a total of {nb_f} pages plus {nb_t} times. If we look more closely, that gives us an average of {nb_t_par_mois} prints per month, with about {nbf_par_mois} sheets on average. You print {nb_moy_par_mois} copies per print. I won't spare you the turnover: {ca} euros since the beginning, if we remove the {doit} euros that we are owed: {ca2} euros. You gave us {ca1} euros. So we are {benf} euros, but that's without counting the condo rent price which at 50 euros per month would make us... ! Big data is here, I'll let you look :) ps: and it's also 1800 lines of code!

imposition.title: PDF Imposition
imposition.subtitle: Create an A3 booklet from your PDF
imposition.drag_drop: Drag and drop your PDF here
imposition.click_select: or click to select a file
imposition.a5_pages: 8 A5 pages per A3 (4 front + 4 back)
imposition.a6_pages: 16 A6 pages per A3 (8 front + 8 back)
imposition.central_desc: Mark in middle according to orientation (21cm)

unimpose.title: Unimpose a PDF
unimpose.subtitle: Transform booklet into normal pages
unimpose.click_select: or click to select a file
unimpose.how_it_works_desc: This function allows you to transform an imposed PDF (booklet) into normal pages:
unimpose.a3_to_a4: Imposed A3 pages → Normal A4 pages
unimpose.two_pages_to_one: 2 pages per sheet → 1 page per sheet
unimpose.tip: Perfect for recovering an original document from an already imposed booklet.

imposition_tracts.title: Tract Imposition
imposition_tracts.subtitle: Duplicate and optimize your tracts
imposition_tracts.drag_drop: Drag and drop your tract PDF here
imposition_tracts.click_select: or click to select a file
imposition_tracts.tract_a4_desc: Automatically duplicates and places 2 copies on 1 A3 sheet.
imposition_tracts.tract_a5_desc: Automatically duplicates and places 4 copies on 1 A3 sheet.
imposition_tracts.tract_a6_desc: Automatically duplicates and places 8 copies on 1 A3 sheet.
imposition_tracts.recto_verso_desc: Automatically handles duplex tracts with the same logic.

png_to_pdf.title: Images to PDF
png_to_pdf.subtitle: Convert PNG/JPG to PDF A3/A4
png_to_pdf.file_info: PNG, JPG - Maximum 50MB per file - Multiple images create a multi-page PDF
png_to_pdf.how_it_works_desc: This function allows you to convert your images to print-ready PDF:
png_to_pdf.format_a4: A4 Format: Ideal for standard printing (210 × 297 mm)
png_to_pdf.format_a3: A3 Format: For large posters (297 × 420 mm)
png_to_pdf.multi_images: Multi-images: Each image will be placed on a separate page
png_to_pdf.auto_fit: Automatic adjustment: Images are resized to fit the format
png_to_pdf.tip: Tip: For a double-sided flyer, create 2 images and convert them to a 2-page PDF.

pdf_to_png.title: PDF to Images
pdf_to_png.subtitle: Extract pages as PNG
pdf_to_png.click_select: or click to select a file
pdf_to_png.how_it_works_desc: This function allows you to extract PDF pages as PNG images:
pdf_to_png.one_image_per_page: One image per page: Each page becomes a separate image
pdf_to_png.png_format: PNG format: High quality with transparency support
pdf_to_png.adjustable_quality: Adjustable quality: Choose between 72, 150 or 300 DPI
pdf_to_png.zip_download: ZIP download: All images in one archive
pdf_to_png.tip: Tip: Use 300 DPI to get high-quality images ready for printing.

riso_separator.title: Riso Separator
riso_separator.subtitle: Separate colors for multi-drum
riso_separator.tolerance_desc: Tolerance determines which pixels are considered "white" (empty). A value of 245 is recommended.
riso_separator.step1: Upload a color image (PNG or JPG)
riso_separator.step2: Choose a mode: RGB (3 channels), CMYK (4 channels), or 2 Drums (B&W)
riso_separator.step3: Assign a drum to each channel
riso_separator.step4: Adjust the opacity of each layer
riso_separator.rgb_mode: RGB Mode: Separates into Red, Green, Blue (standard)
riso_separator.cmyk_mode: CMYK Mode: Separates into Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black (printing)
riso_separator.two_drums_mode: 2 Drums Mode: For B&W images, separates light/dark tones
riso_separator.pipette: Pipette: Click on a color to isolate it with adjustable tolerance
riso_separator.posterize: Posterize: Reduces gray levels (screen printing effect)
riso_separator.halftone: Halftone: Applies dot patterns (authentic Riso effect)
riso_separator.tip_text: Layers are exported in grayscale. On the Riso, print each layer with the corresponding drum. The overlay will create the final color image!
riso_separator.experiment_text: Try different combinations of drums, posterization, and halftone to create unique effects. The 2-drum mode is perfect for impactful two-color posters.

taux_remplissage.title: Fill Rate
taux_remplissage.subtitle: Calculate ink usage percentage
taux_remplissage.tolerance_desc: Tolerance determines which pixels are considered "white" (empty). A value of 245 is recommended.
taux_remplissage.drag_drop: Drag your PDF or image here
taux_remplissage.click_select: or click to select a file
taux_remplissage.file_info: PDF, JPEG, PNG or GIF - Maximum 50MB
taux_remplissage.how_it_works_desc: This tool analyzes your documents to calculate the percentage of ink/toner used:
taux_remplissage.supported_formats: Supported formats: PDF, JPEG, PNG, GIF
taux_remplissage.detailed_stats: Detailed statistics: Size, resolution, main colors
taux_remplissage.tip: Tip: A high fill rate indicates significant ink consumption. Ideal for estimating printing costs.

aide_machines.title: Help & Machine Q&A
aide_machines.no_qa_available_desc: Contact the administrator to add questions and answers for this machine.
aide_machines.no_qa_yet: No questions and answers are available for the machines yet.
aide_machines.no_qa_yet_desc: Contact the administrator to add help information.
